issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description: I really really need your help. short cut key ctr + / is not working in my studio. I tried all sort of suggestion available on internet.  Even in window -> preference -> key this comment is not present. However this is the one short cut key I can't live without it. I feel I can trade my IDE but cant tolerate not to work. Please suggest me any way to get this key working.
fields.summary: Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.0.1.201506021908 comment code is not working
fields.environment: Os: Window 7 (64 bit),   App Studio  build: 4.0.1.201506021908

comments.body: Thanks, issue has been fixed in Release 4.0.2 [ 16794 ] .
